channel.title: DragonzPkzScape The New GENERATION
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s19/hollimaster/ThrBaned.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s19/hollimaster/addesign.gif[/img]
[b][size=20pt]Welcome To The Project DragonzPkzScape Thread[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]The Latest Generation To Private Servers[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]Name Picked By Crucious & DragonzPk[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]Starting Place Picked By Edd[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]Whip Special Thanks To Knight (Sam)[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]The SYIPkPker Blocker By Kevin[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]Credits List Thanks To Me[/size][/b]
[b][size=10pt]The Server Features[/size][/b] [b]The Warn Command[/b] [b]The GiveStaff Command[/b] [b]The Anti Crasher By Kevin[/b] [b]The Superman Command[/b] [b]Global Objects Added[/b] [b]Commands Added[/b] [b]Train On Portals[/b] [b]Barrows Added[/b] [b]377 Client In Make[/b] [b]98% Mage Runes Required[/b] [b]Added Lovecats With The Command[/b] [b]Add All New Shops[/b] [b]Defence And Weapon Requirements Needed[/b] Anougth On This
[b]Applying Layout[/b]
[code]Age Forum User:Mine Active: How Long Will You Be On A Day: *Hosters Only* How Long Can You Host The Server For:[/code]
[b]Places Availibele[/b]
Hoster*1 Coders*4 Homepage Designer*1 Forum Mod*1 (Apply On Forum) Player Mod*1 (Apply On Forum) Forum Admin*0 Player Admin*0 (This Will Be Updated All The Time)
Forum Admins
Edd Knight
Forum Mods
Dream89 Layla Jayy Tornado 8BallCrazy Kombo Darkness Hippie
Player Admins
Dragonzpk (Owner) (Me) Edd (Co Owner) Iron Maiden (Co Owner2) Layla (Head Admin) Burnsy Marc Wolf
Player Mods
8BallCrazy (Head Mod) And Many More
Forums: www.dragonzpkzscape.com/forum Website: www.dragonzpkzscape.com
Pictures Of Success Soon To Come ~Posted By DragonzPk (Fallendevil)~
